isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX 2150 - ASSEMBLY - PISTON AND CONNECTING ROD

svcproc.title: PISTON AND CONNECTING ROD
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 11for numbers in parentheses, unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Prelubricate the piston (24), piston rings(20, 21, 22), wrist pin (25) and connecting rod (27).
Install the piston rings in the correct location with the ring pip marks up. (Refer to Figure 12.) Stagger the position of the ring gaps.

Align the wrist pin bore of the connecting rod with the piston bores and install the wrist pin to secure the rod to the piston. Make certain the teflon "buttons" (26) are installed in each end of the wrist pin.

Using an automotive type ring compressor or similar tool, compress the piston rings and gently install the connecting rod and piston in the cylinder bore. Install the connecting rod cap (36) on the connecting rod in the same position as marked during disassembly.

Secure the rod cap to the rod using the two capscrews (38) and special lockwashers (37). Tighten the cap screws to the values specified in the Torque Chart and bend the tabs of the lockwashers until they are firmly against the flats of the hex head of the cap screws.
